definition: variant of 窪|洼[wa1]/(used in names)

sentences.english: Examine the host for dents, kinks, deformation or chafing.
sentences.chinese: 检查软管是否有凹坑，纽结，变形或擦伤。

sentences.english: One can hardly discern the bottom of the open pit.
sentences.chinese: 难分辨的是开放凹坑的底部。

sentences.english: The catalyst was coatedon the surface of piston bowl.
sentences.chinese: 催化剂镀在活塞凹坑表面。

sentences.english: The sprue leads into a circular recess (Figure 4.21), slightly smaller than the inside diameter of the tube.
sentences.chinese: 主流道引入到一个比管子内径稍小的圆形凹坑。

sentences.english: These are freshwater springs, jetting into the bottom of the Dead Sea from inside craters.
sentences.chinese: 那是淡水的泉水，从内部凹坑中涌入死海底部。

sentences.english: The surfaces of the discs are covered with trapezoidal protrusions, circular indentations and air holes.
sentences.chinese: 转碟表面密布有梯形凸块，圆形凹坑和通气孔。

sentences.english: Now the barren river bed is pitted with cracks and subsidence holes.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，干涸的河床布满凹坑，处处是裂缝和孔洞。

sentences.english: The pockmarks made by her bullets are still on the wall .
sentences.chinese: 墙上仍然有她的子弹留下的凹坑。
环形山是碗状凹坑结构。

sentences.english: NASA image of depressions on Mars interpreted as ancient lake basins.
sentences.chinese: 美国宇航局的一幅被视为古湖盆地的火星凹坑图像。

sentences.english: The reason of the pit reduced the nucleation energy is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析和讨论了凹坑降低金刚石核形成能的原因。

sentences.english: ANASA image of depressions on Mars interpreted as ancient lake basins.
sentences.chinese: 美国宇航局的一幅被视为古湖盆地的火星凹坑图像。

definition: Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
